ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] A question about the Tashania quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure if you can initiate a trade without dropping invis, but you can raise your faction in Neriak by giving red wine to a npc in the library.  I ve
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure if you can initiate a trade without dropping invis, but you
can raise your faction in Neriak by giving red wine to a npc in the
library. I've done this to get my faction up. I don't remember the name
of the NPC in question but he is in a room by himself, and nobody will
assist him if he attacks you, or you attack him. you should be relatively
safe in this room. At lvl 16 he conned green to me and was REAL easy for
me to kill (tome of ages quest). You can try giving him wine while in
minor illusion, invis, etc to see if you can. The factions raised are
Dread Guard Inner, Dread Guard Outer, and Dark Barganers (which is Mizr's
faction I believe?). I know it's boring, but a hundred or so wines should
raise your faction to dubious to these groups. 80 wines got me from
amiable to warmly.

Whether you want (or can) raise your faction in neriak, this would be the
safest place to test your invis/trade.

Hope this helps :)

Ezrae
21st DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis


On Wed, 15 Mar 2000 eantravis@... wrote:

.From: eantravis@...
.
.I know every detail of the quest to get the Tashania spell, but one part
.worries me. I am currently KOS to most faction groups in Neriak (even with
.Illusion: Dark Elf and Benevolence) because of my religion (Erollisi Marr)
.and a few unfortunate run-ins with the Neriak Guard population. One part of
.the Tashania quest reqiuires that I see Mizr N'Mar in the Neriak Library to
.get my glowing coin of Tash converted into a gleaming coin of Tash. Will I
.be able to do this without dropping invis? Being invis is basically the
.only way I can roam Neriak unmolested, and I am usure if initiating a trade
.with an NPC will cause my invisibility to drop. I am pretty sure that would
.be the case, and being killed by angry NPCs in the Neriak Library really
.doesnt appeal to me...
.
.I would appreciate some advice from anyone that has completed this quest.
.Am I right to think that initiating a trade with an NPC will make you
.appear? If so, does anyone know what faction group Mizr and the surrounding
.NPCs belong to? And is there anyway that I can raise my faction with this
.group? Any help would be appreciated :)
.
.
.Timn the Enchanter
.43rd level, Erollisi Marr
."There are some who call me . . . Timn?"
.
.
.
.================================
.Ean Travis
.
